articles.title: Botswana unearths 'world's third largest diamond' - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: A 1,098 carat diamond believed to be the third largest gem-quality stone ever to be mined, has been discovered in Botswana, according to a joint venture between Anglo American's De Beers and the government.
